content:
Sure, below are the pricing and hours information of the popular pizza places in New Haven, Connecticut:

1. Frank Pepe Pizzeria Napoletana - Prices vary depending on toppings and size. Expect to pay around $12-$20 for a small pizza, $15-$25 for a medium pizza, and $20-$30 for a large pizza. Hours: Monday-Thursday 11am-10pm, Friday-Saturday 11am-11pm, Sunday 12pm-10pm.

2. Sally's Apizza - Prices vary depending on toppings and size. Expect to pay around $14-$20 for a small pizza, $16-$24 for a medium pizza, and $20-$28 for a large pizza. Hours: Tuesday-Saturday 4pm-9pm, Sunday 12pm-8pm. Closed on Mondays.

3. Modern Apizza - Prices vary depending on toppings and size. Expect to pay around $14-$18 for a small pizza, $17-$22 for a medium pizza, and $20-$30 for a large pizza. Hours: Sunday-Thursday 11am-10pm, Friday-Saturday 11am-11pm.

4. BAR - Prices vary depending on toppings and size. Expect to pay around $11-$16 for a small pizza, $16-$21 for a medium pizza, and $21-$27 for a large pizza. Hours: Monday-Thursday 11:30am-11pm, Friday-Saturday 11:30am-12am, Sunday 12pm-11pm.

5. Zuppardi's Apizza - Prices vary depending on toppings and size. Expect to pay around $12-$16 for a small pizza, $16-$20 for a medium pizza, and $20-$28 for a large pizza. Hours: Tuesday-Thursday 11am-8pm, Friday-Saturday 11am-9pm, Sunday 12pm-8pm. Closed on Mondays.

Note: Prices and hours are subject to change, it's always best to check the official website or call the restaurant beforehand.
